extension.description: Automatically run Picture-in-Picture service code when Kodi starts. Use ramdisk for temporary folder!
extension.news: V1.1.0 (2021-08-30) - Released - Added "wait"-image that is displayed while ffmpeg starts to capture the stream - Used ramdisk /dev/shm as temporary folder by default #3 - If /dev/shm is no accessible or a non-Linux platform is detected user has to create and configure a folder on a ramdisk manually! - Added channel number and channel name to a displayed pip image #4 - Made key shortcuts configurable (toggle, back to channel, channel up and channel down) #5
